product_description: Manyavar నుండి ఈ నాగరీకమైన పఠానీ కుర్తా ధరించడం ద్వారా మీ సాంప్రదాయ అల్మారాకు అందమైన జోడింపు చేయండి, ఇది తాజా పోకడలను దృష్టిలో ఉంచుకుని రూపొందించబడింది. చక్కటి నాణ్యమైన ఫ్యాబ్రిక్ నుండి తయారవుతుంది మరియు స్టైల్ డాష్ కోసం రెగ్యులర్ కాలర్తో రూపొందించబడింది. ఈ కుర్తా నాణ్యతలో అధికంగా ఉంటుంది మరియు ధరించడానికి సౌకర్యంగా ఉంటుంది. ఇది మీ వార్డ్రోబ్కు గొప్ప జోడింపు మరియు అందరి నుండి మిమ్మల్ని అభినందిస్తుంది.Make a gorgeous addition to your ethnic closet by wearing this fashionable pathani kurta from Manyavar, which has been designed keeping the latest trends in mind. Made from fine quality fabric and fashioned with a regular collar for a dash of style. This kurta is high in quality and comfortable to wear. It is a great addition to your wardrobe and will win you compliments from one and all.Manyavar এর এই ফ্যাশনেবল পাঠানি কুর্তা পরে আপনার এথনিক ক্লোজেটে একটি চমৎকার সংযোজন করুন, যা সর্বশেষ ট্রেন্ডগুলি মাথায় রেখে ডিজাইন করা হয়েছে. সূক্ষ্ম মানের ফ্যাব্রিক থেকে তৈরি এবং স্টাইলের এক ড্যাশ জন্য নিয়মিত কলার দিয়ে ফ্যাশনড. এই কুর্তাটি উচ্চ মানের এবং পরতে আরামদায়ক. এটি আপনার পোশাকের জন্য একটি দুর্দান্ত সংযোজন এবং সবার কাছ থেকে আপনাকে প্রশংসা জিতবে.Manyavar चा हा फॅशनेबल पठाणी कुर्ता परिधान करून आपल्या पारंपारिक कपाटात एक सुंदर भर घाला, जो नवीनतम ट्रेंड लक्षात घेऊन डिझाइन केला गेला आहे. उत्कृष्ट गुणवत्तेच्या फॅब्रिकपासून बनविलेले आणि शैलीच्या डॅशसाठी नियमित कॉलरसह फॅशन केलेले. हा कुर्ता उच्च दर्जाचा आणि घालण्यास आरामदायक आहे. ही तुमच्या वॉर्डरोबमध्ये एक चांगली भर आहे आणि तुम्हाला एकाहून अधिक प्रशंसा मिळवून देईल.Manyavar இன் இந்த நாகரீகமான பதானி குர்தாவை அணிவதன் மூலம் உங்கள் பாரம்பரிய ஆடையமைப்புக்கு ஒரு அழகான சேர்க்கையை உருவாக்குங்கள், இது சமீபத்திய போக்குகளை மனதில் வைத்து வடிவமைக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது. சிறந்த தரமான துணியிலிருந்து தயாரிக்கப்படுகிறது மற்றும் ஒரு கோடு ஸ்டைலுக்காக வழக்கமான காலருடன் வடிவமைக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது. இந்த குர்தா உயர்தரமானது மற்றும் அணிய வசதியாக இருக்கும். இது உங்கள் அலமாரிக்கு ஒரு சிறந்த சேர்க்கையாகும், மேலும் அனைவரிடமிருந்தும் உங்களுக்கு பாராட்டுக்களைத் தரும்.Manyavar-ൽ നിന്നുള്ള ഈ ഫാഷനബിൾ പത്താനി കുർത്ത ധരിച്ച് നിങ്ങളുടെ പരമ്പരാഗത വസ്ത്ര ശേഖരത്തിന് ഒരു മികച്ച മുതൽക്കൂട്ടായിരിക്കും. ഇത് ഏറ്റവും പുതിയ ട്രെൻഡുകൾ മനസ്സിൽ കണ്ടുകൊണ്ടാണ് ഡിസൈൻ ചെയ്തിരിക്കുന്നത്. മികച്ച നിലവാരമുള്ള തുണിത്തരങ്ങളിൽ നിന്ന് നിർമ്മിച്ചതും നല്ല സ്റ്റൈലിനായി ഒരു സാധാരണ കോളർ ഉപയോഗിച്ച് രൂപകൽപ്പന ചെയ്തതുമാണ്. ഈ കുർത്ത ഉയർന്ന നിലവാരമുള്ളതും ധരിക്കാൻ സുഖകരവുമാണ്. ഇത് നിങ്ങളുടെ വസ്ത്രശേഖരത്തിലേക്ക് ഒരു മികച്ച കൂട്ടിച്ചേർക്കലാണ്, മാത്രമല്ല എല്ലാവരിൽ നിന്നും നിങ്ങൾക്ക് അഭിനന്ദനങ്ങൾ നേടിത്തരും.Manyavar के इस फैशनेबल पथनी कुर्ता को पहनकर अपने एथनिक कोठरी के लिए एक भव्य जोड़ बनाएं, जिसे नवीनतम रुझानों को ध्यान में रखते हुए डिज़ाइन किया गया है। अच्छी गुणवत्ता वाले कपड़े से बनाया गया है और स्टाइल के डैश के लिए नियमित कॉलर के साथ फैशन किया गया है। यह कुर्ता क्वालिटी में हाई और पहनने में आरामदायक है. यह आपकी अलमारी के लिए एक बढ़िया अतिरिक्त है और आपको एक और सभी से तारीफ जीतेंगे।ಇತ್ತೀಚಿನ ಪ್ರವೃತ್ತಿಗಳನ್ನು ಗಮನದಲ್ಲಿಟ್ಟುಕೊಂಡು ವಿನ್ಯಾಸಗೊಳಿಸಲಾದ Manyavar ನ ಈ ಫ್ಯಾಶನ್ ಪಠಾನಿ ಕುರ್ತಾವನ್ನು ಧರಿಸುವ ಮೂಲಕ ನಿಮ್ಮ ಜನಾಂಗೀಯ ಕ್ಲೋಸೆಟ್ಗೆ ಬಹುಕಾಂತೀಯ ಸೇರ್ಪಡೆ ಮಾಡಿ. ಉತ್ತಮ ಗುಣಮಟ್ಟದ ಬಟ್ಟೆಯಿಂದ ತಯಾರಿಸಲಾಗುತ್ತದೆ ಮತ್ತು ಶೈಲಿಯ ಡ್ಯಾಶ್ ಗಾಗಿ ನಿಯಮಿತ ಕಾಲರ್ನೊಂದಿಗೆ ವಿನ್ಯಾಸಗೊಳಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಈ ಕುರ್ತಾ ಗುಣಮಟ್ಟದಲ್ಲಿ ಉತ್ತಮ ಮತ್ತು ಧರಿಸಲು ಆರಾಮದಾಯಕವಾಗಿದೆ. ಇದು ನಿಮ್ಮ ವಾರ್ಡ್ರೋಬ್ಗೆ ಉತ್ತಮ ಸೇರ್ಪಡೆಯಾಗಿದೆ ಮತ್ತು ಎಲ್ಲರಿಂದ ನಿಮಗೆ ಅಭಿನಂದನೆಗಳನ್ನು ಗೆಲ್ಲುತ್ತದೆ.

product_description: This is a royal Indo-Western style Sherwani with a slim fit stitch. The floral print pattern on the dress is a perfect blend of artistic workmanship and skills. It is crafted perfectly with cotton lining on the inside and detailing. Jacquard silk fabric is used in the making of this ostentatious Kurta.It is diverse with its woven patterns. The fabric in this clothing has a contrasting light and lustre. The Kurta has a full front button-up closure with dazzling and finely crafted buttons. These buttons add extra style and elegance to the clothing. This kurta flaunts an elegant stand-up Mandarin Collar for a taller appeal. This band collar has rounded edges with a V-neckline. A silk blend free size pant is provided with the Kurta to complete the attire.The pants are absolutely comfortable to wear and flattering in looks. There is a chest pocket on the right side of the Kurta for a traditional look. It has pocket square to make the wearer look classier. Faux jewellery is added as part of the royal theme of the dress.

product_description: Bgn Apparels ,formed in 1980, was started by Mr. Satish Gupta.hangup deals in mens wear which has presence in India and aboard.these comprise of a combination of exclusive brand outlets that deals with heritage of Indian textiles and puts to use traditional weaves and silks from master weavers all over the country to create styles that are classic, trendy, and timeless and can be handed down from one generation to the next. a collection that embodies the beauty of hand crafted embroideries and fabrics. This label brings together couture sensibilities and timeless style. a high-impact globetrotting mix of Indian and western wear that works up this fashion brand into a comfortable trendy occasion wear. the range is for those who need wardrobe versatility in everyday semi formal-to-formal clothing. It lets you skillfully team up separates that are international in appeal and cater to individual taste. this brand brings out fresh new collections in contemporary styles that combine elegance with strong detailing that makes a strong fashion statement. our brand encourages the use of organic textiles made from techniques that are environment friendly. we revive the artisan culture by using traditional textile practices and techniques that caters to a large segment, ranging from youngsters to fashion conscious Corporate executives. hangup is known as a brand that’s trendy, stylish and affordable, a place where style meets quality and comfort.

product_description: A completely traditional Indian design, this indo western sherwani is handmade from the absolute finest of Cotton silk and feels as light as air to treat you to stylish luxury with each and every wear. Like traditional dress worn in India, this sherwani dress includes both a top and a bottom. A round collar neck keeps your chest cool. Loose fitting sleeves and slits along the sides allow for an easy fit and let air circulate freely through the garment. The pant included in this indo western outfit has a relaxed fit through the seat and legs for absolute comfort. Loose comfortable fitting makes it a great wear. This simple sherwani is worn in both summer and winter. Indo western outfits like this is traditionally worn in every festivals and special occasions. The ways that you can wear this luxurious designer sherwanis are endless you can mix and match the pieces with other things in your wardrobe. How confident are you in finding a size that will fit you well?

product_description: A completely traditional Indian design_ this indo western sherwani is handmade from the absolute finest of dupion art silk and feels as light as air to treat you to stylish luxury with each and every wear. Like traditional dress worn in India_ this sherwani dress includes both a top and a bottom. A round collar neck keeps your chest cool. Loose fitting sleeves and slits along the sides allow for an easy fit and let air circulate freely through the garment. The pant included in this indo western outfit has a relaxed fit through the seat and legs for absolute comfort. Loose comfortable fitting makes it a great wear. This simple sherwani is worn in both summer and winter. Comes with complimentary free size trouser pajama with drawstring in waist. Indo western outfits like this is traditionally worn in every festivals and special occasions. The ways that you can wear this luxurious designer sherwanis are endless you can mix and match the pieces with other things in your wardrobe.

Their ethnic collection is definitely worth trying if you wish to make heads turn.Hangup is a online fashion retailer that focuses majorly on stylish and trendsetting collections of ready-to-wear collection. They also offer smart indo-western outfits that can be worn casually or dressed up for occasions. Hangup stores house ethnic dresses for men,women and kids of all ages, shapes and sizes. The brand’s special attention to fit and fabric quality make it a favourite among many indian.

product_description: Bgn Apparels ,formed in 1980, was started by Mr. Satish Gupta.hangup deals in mens wear which has presence in India and aboard.these comprise of a combination of exclusive brand outlets that deals with heritage of Indian textiles and puts to use traditional weaves and silks from master weavers all over the country to create styles that are classic, trendy, and timeless and can be handed down from one generation to the next. a collection that embodies the beauty of hand crafted embroideries and fabrics. This label brings together couture sensibilities and timeless style. a high-impact globetrotting mix of Indian and western wear that works up this fashion brand into a comfortable trendy occasion wear. the range is for those who need wardrobe versatility in everyday semi formal-to-formal clothing. It lets you skillfully team up separates that are international in appeal and cater to individual taste. this brand brings out fresh new collections in contemporary styles that combine elegance with strong detailing that makes a strong fashion statement. our brand encourages the use of organic textiles made from techniques that are environment friendly. we revive the artisan culture by using traditional textile practices and techniques that caters to a large segment, ranging from youngsters to fashion conscious Corporate executives. hangup is known as a brand that’s trendy, stylish and affordable, a place where style meets quality and comfort.

product_description: which has been designed keeping the latest trends in mind. This set is a must have in a man's ethnic wardrobe. It has been crafted using fine quality fabric and promises to be a comfortable wear. It will augment your look and make you the centre of attraction at any occasion. Kurta Pajamas have always been the first choice of men when it comes shopping for ethnic wear, as they offer the utmost comfort to the wearer. In addition to that, we have one of the finest collection of Kurta Pajamas For Men online made available at cut-rate prices. Our men's ethnic wear collection. The Indian subcontinent gave birth to the popular traditional attire - the Kurta. The word has its origins in the Urdu, Hindustani language and has also got the name from the Sanskrit word kuratu or kurtaka. In Persian it literally means a collarless shirt and it indeed is a collarless dress but some variants have a collar. The dress is commonly worn in countries such as Nepal, Pakistan, Afghanistan, and Sri Lanka along with India. It is worn with pajamas, pants, jeans, Dhoti and Lungis too and is stitched in fabrics like cotton, silk, voile, jute, khadi, and kota.

product_description: RG Designers brings you this fashionable ethnic tribal warli printed collection. The kurta has 02 pockets, one on each side of the kurta thus providing the ease of carrying wallets / phone / cash. The kurta comes along with well contrasted pyjama pants which ensures to give you the best look for any occasion. The Pyjama have a zipper closure with adjustable drawstring. This kurta-pyjama set can be your perfect choice for an ethnic and traditional look. Be it your friend's sangeet / mehendi function or an ethnic day at your workplace, you can surely keep it as an option. Give your look a finishing touch with a golden Kolhapuri shoe/mojaris and you can be the center of attraction for the evening. Wash Care Instructions: All the attires from RG Designers are made of the finest material. To maintain this beautiful outfit we strongly recommend dry cleaning process. Please refer the wash care routine instructions to avoid product shrinking and color bleeding. After first usage strictly dry clean the product, for next washes go ahead with normal hand wash OR delicate machine wash. Failure to follow the above routine can lead to product shrinking and/or color bleeding

product_description: About Rajubhai Hargovindas Rajubhai Hargovindas is a renowned name in Men's Indian Traditional wear (Kurta Pajama), Ethnic Wear.Based out of Mumbai, India, it has a rich heritage spanning 70 Years having maintained a sustained credibility for its Quality Products and Hospitable Shopping Experience. You can teamed up this Kurta with Nehru jacket or else cargo jacket with dhotis, remember never tie up this combination with saturated to saturate color . choose jacket wisely by selecting saturate to unsaturated or vise versa and select lighter shades for bottom more over go for creamy color and lastly Punjabi jutis will enhance your look. Simply wear this Kurta with straight pyjama and pair with flip-flop or kolhapuri chappal ,This will stand you out in crowd with barely any effort.Choose lighter shade , as you can see there are ten different color and many are lighter in shades , definitely demines are one and only look classy and funky even chinos work like charm and simply roll up your sleeves , I know there are no sleeves button but that what make its beautiful and funky,give a touch by just opening up some of your front button.

product_description: A completely traditional Indian design_ this indo western sherwani is handmade from the absolute finest of dupion art silk and feels as light as air to treat you to stylish luxury with each and every wear. Like traditional dress worn in India_ this sherwani dress includes both a top and a bottom. A round collar neck keeps your chest cool. Loose fitting sleeves and slits along the sides allow for an easy fit and let air circulate freely through the garment. The pant included in this indo western outfit has a relaxed fit through the seat and legs for absolute comfort. Loose comfortable fitting makes it a great wear. This simple sherwani is worn in both summer and winter. Comes with complimentary free size trouser pajama with drawstring in waist. Indo western outfits like this is traditionally worn in every festivals and special occasions. The ways that you can wear this luxurious designer sherwanis are endless you can mix and match the pieces with other things in your wardrobe.

product_description: BANHUSSAIN Men Exquisite and Charming Kurta & Pyjama, this Piece from "BANHUSSAIN" is crafted from fine Silk and is the perfect pick for wedding/festive occasion. Team this with a pair of mojaris to complete the traditional and classic look.When you want a kurta that you can wear for everyday wear or special occasions again and again, you need to be choosy about the garment that you purchase. Many kurtas for men are mass produced along assembly lines and have crooked seams or raw edges, while others shrink or fade the first time that they are washed. The Cotton Kurta for Men is superior to these other kurtas found on Amazon, as it's carefully made by skilled artisans out of fade-resistant, no shrink fabric.

product_description: A well-paired and stylish kurta pajama set is a must-have in every man’s closet. With so many festivals and traditional functions taking place throughout the year, having a few classic ethnic wear options in your wardrobe is essential. These outfits look good on men and boys of all ages. They come in a variety of fabrics ranging from pure cotton, cotton-blend, cotton-silk, cotton-shirting, and silk fabrics. You can choose kurtas from a range of classic kurta cuts to modern and angular kurta cuts. You can also pair them with bottoms like churidars, pants, dhotis, and more. Kurtas come in a variety of colours, patterns, styles ranging from asymmetric, pathani, and sherwani kurtas to combinations like ethnic-jacket kurtas or kurta with jackets. You can also add designer waistcoats to enhance your look for the occasion. If yоu like a more contemporary look, you can always pair your cotton kurtas with jeans and complete your look. Divyadham Textiles websites to check the reviews and ratings.
